dmca.title: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: Bob Pankala [mailto:pank@extremepixels.com] Sent: Saturday, October 21, 2006 6:37 PM To: Copyright Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org Subject: Re: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Date: 10-21-2006 http://www.extremepixels.com/ I, Bob Pankala the creator and owner of eXtremepixels.com LLC, certify under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of eXtremepixels LLC. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner or their agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing. My contact information is as follows: - eXtremepixels.com LLC - Bob Pankala / owner and creator - pank@extremepixels.com Allegedly Infringing items or materials: http://www.darkwebhosting.net/files/IPB_centura.rar http://www.darkwebhosting.net/forums/ http://74.52.59.194/~hosted/forums/index.php Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in consideration of the above: http://www.darkwebhosting.net/files/IPB_centura.rar http://www.darkwebhosting.net/forums/ http://74.52.59.194/~hosted/forums/index.php Location of ORIGINAL WORKS: http://www.extremepixels.com/IPB/centura/centura_purchase_details.php My actual or electronic signature follows: | Bob Pankala (pank) | eXtremepixels.com LLC digitalscrapit.com pankpages.com > From: Copyright > Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 11:20:10 -0500 > To: > Cc: > Conversation: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement > Subject: FW: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement > > > Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does > not substantially comply with the required notification elements of > the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). > > Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your > claim. > > Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. > > Legal Response Team > THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. > > -----Original Message----- > From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, October > 10, 2006 5:47 PM Posted To: Copyright > Conversation: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement > Subject: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement > > > ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== > 1. Notice of Copyright Infringement > Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 10 2006 09:32 pm > X-MailFrom: pank@extremepixels.com > X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net > Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for > ; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:58 -0500 > Received: from iapetus.site5.com ([70.47.36.8] helo=moiras.site5.com) > by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from > pank@extremepixels.com) > with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) > (Exim) > id 1GXUlz-000GxG-3A > for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:47 -0500 > Received: from c-24-14-144-24.hsd1.il.comcast.net ([24.14.144.24] > helo=[192.168.0.3]) > by moiras.site5.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1GXUli-0001en-6f for > abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 23:28:30 -0400 > User-Agent: Microsoft-Entourage/11.2.5.060620 > Date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:34 -0500 > Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement > From: Bob Pankala > To: > Message-ID: > Thread-Topic: Notice of Copyright Infringement > Thread-Index: Acbs5VS9kwTrMVjYEduMdgANky6yDA== > Mime-version: 1.0 > Content-type: multipart/alternative; > boundary="B_3243364120_10949042" > X-Antivirus-Scanner: This message has been scanned by ClamAV. > X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it > with any abuse report > X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - moiras.site5.com > X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com > X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] > X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - extremepixels.com > X-Source: > X-Source-Args: > X-Source-Dir: > Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.47.36.8 is neither > permitted nor denied by domain of extremepixels.com) > client-ip=70.47.36.8; Since your mail reader does not >> understand > this format, some or all of this message may not be legible. > > MIME element (text/plain) > NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT > > Date: 10-10-06 > > Hello, > > I am the owner and creator of eXtremepixels.com who exclusively own > professional, commercial forum designs and graphics. > > Your network is being used to offer that software illegally. The > software may be a full version, a hack, crack or security key as > detailed below. > > According to traceroutes and a whois search it appears you are the > supplier of the below server. They are illegally using and illegally > re-distributing my commercial products. > > Location: > http://www.darkwebhosting.net/files/IPB_centura.rar > http://74.52.59.194/~hosted/forums/index.php? > > > Files: > Extremepixels forum skins > Please remove the files and prevent future abuse. > > Thank you. > > MIME element (text/html) > > > Notice of Copyright Infringement SIZE="2"> STYLE='font-size:12.0px'>NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

below.
